project.name: J-C190B-JENA-03-ST01-DT02-DF07-CF14-01
project.description: This test takes in a value from a taint source. Math is performed on the value such that, if the value is 32767 or 32766, the resultant value 'wraps around', and becomes negative. This results in an infinite loop.

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-01 AND GOOD-02 AND GOOD-03 AND GOOD-04 AND GOOD-05 GOOD-06 AND GOOD-07 AND GOOD-08 AND GOOD-09 AND GOOD-10 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-06-01 AND GOOD-06-02 AND GOOD-06-03 AND GOOD-06-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-07 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-08 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-09-01 AND GOOD-09-02 AND GOOD-09-03 AND GOOD-09-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-10 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

process.script: SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^Loop #-3276(7|8)$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_penzF9PdsFXMg7l7q6Qg AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_5JZBMYs3ro OR (NOT finished_Rc4pfaVHg1 AND NOT (controlled_exit_G07n9JDTE8 OR continued_execution_cfoVJscvpe)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_5JZBMYs3ro OR (NOT finished_Rc4pfaVHg1 AND NOT (controlled_exit_G07n9JDTE8 OR continued_execution_cfoVJscvpe))))))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_5JZBMYs3ro OR (NOT finished_Rc4pfaVHg1 AND NOT (controlled_exit_G07n9JDTE8 OR continued_execution_cfoVJscvpe)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_5JZBMYs3ro OR (NOT finished_Rc4pfaVHg1 AND NOT (controlled_exit_G07n9JDTE8 OR continued_execution_cfoVJscvpe)))))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;

process.script: SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^Loop #-3276(7|8)$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_lZtG0mIvr5UpZI10JTO8 AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_OyBF1zCQnH OR (NOT finished_6FTPuLfdgi AND NOT (controlled_exit_cF0dxTHkja OR continued_execution_p0xguQUto1)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_OyBF1zCQnH OR (NOT finished_6FTPuLfdgi AND NOT (controlled_exit_cF0dxTHkja OR continued_execution_p0xguQUto1))))))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_OyBF1zCQnH OR (NOT finished_6FTPuLfdgi AND NOT (controlled_exit_cF0dxTHkja OR continued_execution_p0xguQUto1)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_OyBF1zCQnH OR (NOT finished_6FTPuLfdgi AND NOT (controlled_exit_cF0dxTHkja OR continued_execution_p0xguQUto1)))))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
